title: Design AKS Network Architecture & VNet Topology
description: Define address spaces, subnets for nodes/pods/services, and network security groups (NSGs).
acceptance_criteria: VNet topology diagram approved; CIDR ranges defined; NSG rules documented
definition_of_done: Architecture document signed off by Security Architect
business_value: Ensures secure and scalable network foundation

title: Develop Terraform Module for AKS Cluster
description: Write HCL code for AKS cluster, node pools (system/user), and identity integration.
acceptance_criteria: Terraform apply creates cluster; OIDC Issuer URL exposed; Azure CNI configured
definition_of_done: Successful terraform plan/apply in dev environment

title: Create Reusable GitHub Actions Workflow Template
description: Develop a composite action or reusable workflow yaml for building Node.js apps, running tests, and linting.
acceptance_criteria: Workflow accepts inputs; Caching configured; Linting/Tests run
definition_of_done: Workflow successfully runs on sample repo

title: Design & Implement PostGIS Service Area Repository
description: Create TypeORM entities for Service Centers with Geometry columns and implement geospatial query methods.
acceptance_criteria: Entity supports Polygon; findCoveringCenters query works; Spatial index active
definition_of_done: Integration tests passing with test polygons

title: Setup WebSocket Gateway & Auth Guard
description: Initialize Socket.io Gateway in NestJS and implement JWT authentication guard for WSS connections.
acceptance_criteria: Gateway accepts WSS; Handshake fails without valid JWT; User ID extracted

title: Design & Setup WatermelonDB Schema
description: Define local database schema for Tickets, Products, and Notes. Configure WatermelonDB.
acceptance_criteria: Schema matches backend; DB initializes on iOS/Android; Local CRUD works

title: Integrate Routing Service with Orchestration Logic
description: Combine geospatial lookup and round-robin logic into a cohesive RoutingService.
acceptance_criteria: Handles no coverage; Returns Center ID; <200ms execution

title: Implement Request Queue & Network Monitor
description: Create a Redux/Context store to queue mutation actions when offline.
acceptance_criteria: Actions queue when offline; Queue persists restart; Network change triggers sync

title: Implement Sync Process & Conflict Resolution
description: Logic to replay queued requests to backend and handle 409 Conflict responses.
acceptance_criteria: FIFO processing; Successful removal; Failed item handling; Server-wins strategy
definition_of_done: Integration tests with mock backend pass

title: Implement Background Location Service Logic
description: Integrate react-native-background-geolocation to fetch coords and send via WebSocket.
acceptance_criteria: Coords captured every 30s background; Sent to WS; Battery optimized
testing_requirements: Battery drain test, Background execution test

title: Implement Room Management & Message Persistence
description: Logic to join sockets to Ticket-ID rooms and save messages to PostgreSQL.
acceptance_criteria: Join room by Ticket ID; Authorization check; Save to DB; Broadcast
